name: Luna-C
description: '''Luna-C''' (born '''Christopher Howell''', 1 May 1973) is a British DJ, record producer, and label owner, known for his work in [[breakbeat hardcore|breakbeat]] and [[happy hardcore]] music. He was a member of the group Smart E's in 1992, who scored a No.2 hit on the [[UK Singles Chart]] with "[[Sesame's Treet]]".  He went on to found the Kniteforce Records label, for which he also produced tracks and remixes under various aliases. This was resurrected in 2001 as Kniteforce Again (KFA) and continues to this day.
